posts.postText: I was just wondering why my last post got locked. I was just saying i will miss everyone in a jokingly manor. Gash you take everything i do the wrong way. It wasn't meant to mean, "Hey everyone i got banned for no reason". I was just posting something because i was bored. Can you please unlock my other Post?
You could just post it in the spam box if you wanted a place to talk to people through the forums. When you put it in other sections it just looks like your trying to get Wabbajack.

Which is stupid by the way. No one really cares about post count. I think that the spam box should be done away with. If all you ever spout is mountains of stupid shit. Then don't talk ever. Off topic could suffice for 75% of those threads.  Threads get derailed all the time because people don't reply to the op, but to the comment above theirs. 

But anyway fudge. I think gash thought you were trying to make a point. But you weren't intending to.
Oh i didn't even think about the spam box. Also yeah he probably was thinking that.
fudge D: gonna be gone T_T
